au_1056375: prmfn() {
  if [ "$PWD" == "yourdirectorypath" ]; then
    export CUSTOM_ENV_VAR=value
  else
    unset CUSTOM_ENV_VAR
  fi
}

export PROMPT_COMMAND=prmfn
